Class Cell

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Cell
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Selectable
public abstract class Cell
extends greenfoot.Actor
implements Selectable, java.io.Serializable

The generic unit of anything that occupies a space on the Map, such as a Building. The class controls the basic functionality of the interaction between the Cell itself and the map, whereas subclasses of this would control specific interaction between itself and the user.

Version:
Alpha 2.0
Author:
Alston lin
See Also:
